0.name: Lucent Moonglow
0.fullDesc: Deals Ice DMG equal to <orangeStrong>{{1}}%</orangeStrong> of Jingliu's ATK to a single enemy.
0.shortDesc: Deals minor Ice DMG to a single enemy target.

0.name: Transcendent Flash
0.fullDesc: Deals Ice DMG equal to <orangeStrong>{{1}}%</orangeStrong> of Jingliu's ATK to a single enemy and obtains {{2}} stack(s) of Syzygy.
0.shortDesc: Deals Ice DMG to a target enemy and obtains <color=#f29e38ff>1 stack of Syzygy</color>.

1.name: Moon On Glacial River
1.fullDesc: Deals Ice DMG equal to <orangeStrong>{{1}}%</orangeStrong> of Jingliu's ATK to a single enemy, and deals Ice DMG equal to <orangeStrong>{{3}}%</orangeStrong> of Jingliu's ATK to adjacent enemies. Consumes {{2}} stack(s) of Syzygy. Using this ability does not consume Skill Points.
1.shortDesc: Deals Ice DMG to a single enemy target and Ice DMG to adjacent targets. Consumes 1 stack of Syzygy.

0.name: Florephemeral Dreamflux
0.fullDesc: Deals Ice DMG equal to <orangeStrong>{{1}}%</orangeStrong> of Jingliu's ATK to a single enemy, and deals Ice DMG equal to <orangeStrong>{{3}}%</orangeStrong> of Jingliu's ATK to any adjacent enemies. Gains {{2}} stack(s) of Syzygy after attack ends.
0.shortDesc: Deals massive Ice DMG to a target enemy and deals Ice DMG to adjacent targets. Obtains <color=#f29e38ff>1 stack of Syzygy</color>.

0.name: Shine of Truth
0.fullDesc: After using this Technique, creates a dimension around Jingliu that lasts for {{3}} seconds, and all enemies in this dimension will become Frozen. After entering combat with enemies in the dimension, Jingliu immediately regenerates {{6}} Energy and obtains {{1}} stack(s) of Syzygy, with a {{2}}% <u>base chance</u> of Freezing enemy targets for {{4}} turn(s). While Frozen, enemy targets cannot take action, and receive Ice <u>Additional DMG</u> equal to {{5}}% of Jingliu's ATK at the start of every turn. Only 1 dimension created by allies can exist at the same time.
0.shortDesc: Creates a dimension around the character. Enemies within this dimension will become <color=#f29e38ff>Frozen</color>. After entering combat with enemies in the dimension, this character regenerates Energy and obtains 1 stack of Syzygy with a high chance to <color=#f29e38ff>Freeze</color> enemies.

0.name: Attack
0.fullDesc: Attacks an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduces their Toughness of the corresponding Type.
